articles.title: Boris Johnson urged to dump Covid travel rules by chancellor Rishi Sunak - Daily Record
articles.description: The Tory chancellor has challenged Boris Johnson to end quarantine rules for certain countries amid claims that the UK has tougher measures in place than other European countries.
articles.content:
Rishi Sunak has reportedly called for covid restrictions to be further eased for holidaymakers and international business travellers returning to the UK from abroad.
